name: Average Video Games Trivia: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time | 10 Questions

questions.text: In your first dungeon, The Deku Tree, you fight Gohma.  To enter her chambers, what is the order in which you must hit the Deku Scrubs?
questions.explanation:
2, 3, 1.

	As a clue from a previous Deku Scrub, you must hit the Scrubs guarding the chamber in the precise order before you can be let in.  To hit a Deku Scrub, reflect its Deku Nuts back at it with your shield.

questions.text: In Hyrule Market, what is the white dog you must save at night in order to earn a piece of heart?
questions.explanation:
Richard.

	For the heart piece, you return Richard back to its owner.  He's usually behind a stall in the market and needs to be returned to the ugly woman in the blue and white dress who lives near the bombchu shop.

questions.text: When playing Epona's Song on your ocarina, what is the third note?
questions.explanation:
Right C.

	Epona's Song is learned at the Lon Lon Ranch.  You must first meet the princess at Hyrule Castle before arriving or else only Ingo will be there.  Malon teaches you the song in the horse pen.

questions.text: Where do you get Saria's Song?
questions.explanation:
Sacred Forest Meadow.

	You learn Saria's Song in Sacred Forest Meadow just outside of the currently inaccessible Forest Temple.  You are taught the song by Saria herself.

questions.text: Who do you give the Keaton Mask to?
questions.explanation:
The Death Mountain Guard.

	The Keaton Mask is given to the guard who will give it to his son.  It also appears in the next Zelda game called Majora's Mask.  To get the mask, go to the Happy Mask Shop in Hyrule Market.

Darunia.

	Darunia gives you the Goron Bracelet which enables you to lift bomb flowers.  Outside the city, you'll need it to open up Dodongo's Cavern.

questions.text: While fighting King Dodongo, what do you throw into his mouth?
questions.explanation:
Bombs.

	To temporarily stun King Dodongo, you throw either bombs from your inventory, or bomb flowers from the corners of the arena.  You then sword him until he dies.

questions.text: What colour is the orb inside Farore's Wind?
questions.explanation:
Green.

	Farore's Wind is green and can be found in Zora's Fountain.  It is given to you by one of the Great Fairies.

questions.text: Who is the boss of Jabu-Jabu's Belly?
questions.explanation:
Barinade.

	Barindae is a Bio-Electric Anemone.  For the battle, you'll need the boomerang to chop at the many Biris he swings around him.  After, you'll get the Zora Sapphire.

questions.text: Where is the Temple of Time?
questions.explanation:
Hyrule Market.

	The Temple of Time is the big church-like building that's just of to the side of the shops in Hyrule Market.  This is where the Master Sword is concealed.
